DOC.brief_summary: Study correlation AGEsP HbA1c diabetic retinopathy prevalence : determination cut-off value AGEsP HbA1c type 2 diabetes diagnosis China
DOC.brief_title: Determination Cut-off Value AGEsP HbA1c Type 2 Diabetes Diagnosis China
DOC.detailed_description: To find cut-off point AGEsP HbA1c diagnosis diabetes draw logistic regression model prevalence retinopathy AGEsP level HbA1c level , find point prevalence retinopathy change rapidly .
DOC.criteria: 20~70 year old ; Volunteer participate study sign informed consent .
